summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Modryn Studio landing page. All functionality working perfectly including theme toggle, navigation, responsive design, email signup, and mobile menu.
passed_tests: Page loads without errors or console warnings
Navbar sticky positioning with correct logo and navigation links
Theme toggle functionality working on desktop and mobile
Hero section with correct headline and subheadline text
CTA buttons scroll to correct sections (#tools and #log)
Tools section displaying 'The Tools' heading and building card with badge
Build log section with 3 terminal-style entries and correct tags
Email signup form with success message after submission
Footer with logo, navigation links, and tagline
Mobile responsiveness with working hamburger menu
All data-testid attributes present for testing
Font implementation - Space Grotesk for headings, Space Mono for body
